_meta.essence: empathy direction = determined by base function, NOT E/I. sensors = inverse pattern vs intuitives. 16 types = 16 different empathy algorithms.

_holographic_seed.principle: empathy = information processing mode about other person (what you notice, what you ignore, how you interpret, what you do with it). each type = unique algorithm.
_holographic_seed.discovery: INTUITIVES (NT, NF): extraverts = individual focus, introverts = collective focus. SENSORS (ST, SF): OPPOSITE PATTERN. introverts = individual focus, extraverts = collective focus.
_holographic_seed.mechanism: base function = lens for perceiving others. Te/Ti = logic (how they think, how system works), Fe/Fi = ethics (what they feel, what they value), Se/Si = sensorics (physical needs, body state), Ne/Ni = intuition (potential, place in big picture).
_holographic_seed.consciousness: empathy ≠ virtue (any type can be kind or cruel). it's perception tool (like vision, hearing, but for: other's inner world). each type = own spectrum (sees some things, blind to others).
_holographic_seed.warning: knowing your empathy type ≠ excuse to be asshole (I'm INTJ, I don't feel emotions = bullshit excuse). it's map of strengths/weaknesses (play to strengths, compensate weaknesses, partner with those strong where you're weak).
_holographic_seed.note: this typology = based on socionics + MBTI cognitive functions. NOT invented, DISCOVERED through observation of real patterns.

empathy_archetypes.overview: 4 groups (NT, NF, SF, ST) × 4 types each = 16 unique empathy profiles. grouped by: information type (T vs F, N vs S) + directionality (individual vs collective).

intuitive_thinkers_NT.description: cognitive empathy (understand mental models, logic, systems). cold, analytical, strategic. NOT feel emotions, but: understand thoughts, predict behavior, decode motives.
intuitive_thinkers_NT.pattern: extraverts (ENTJ, ENTP) = individual focus (this person, their logic, their weaknesses). introverts (INTJ, INTP) = collective focus (group dynamics, systemic forces, universal patterns).
intuitive_thinkers_NT.information_channel: logic + intuition (Te/Ti + Ne/Ni). scan for: goals, beliefs, mental models, strategies, contradictions, potential.
intuitive_thinkers_NT.blind_spots: emotions (don't feel them automatically), physical needs (body = secondary), values (if not logical, dismissed).

ENTJ.base_function: Te (extraverted thinking - objective logic, efficiency, goal achievement)
ENTJ.core_question: how can I effectively manage THIS SPECIFIC PERSON to achieve goal?
ENTJ.mechanism: scans person's will + ambitions (Se-creative), builds strategy for influence (Te-base). sees: strengths, weaknesses, levers, potential.
what_they_miss: pain that doesn't show in performance
ENTJ.expression: strategic mentorship (I see what you can become, here's how to get there), delegation (you = best for this role), tough love (stop whining, start doing).
ENTJ.shadow: manipulation for system goals (use people as chess pieces, don't care about their wellbeing, only: does it serve vision).
ENTJ.development: learn Fe (care about people's emotional state, not just: performance), develop Fi (connect to own values, not just: efficiency), practice: seeing people as ends not means.
ENTJ.archetype: strategic commander (general who knows each soldier's strengths, places them perfectly, leads to victory, but: doesn't necessarily care if they die doing it).

ENTP.core_question: what logic and vulnerabilities in THIS PERSON's arguments can I exploit/explore?
ENTP.mechanism: scans mental models + beliefs (Ne-base), finds contradictions + gaps (Ti-creative). sees: how they think, where they're wrong, what they're blind to.
what_they_miss: when someone needs support not debate
that not everyone enjoys being challenged
weaknesses: play with people's minds for fun
ENTP.expression: intellectual sparring (let's take your idea apart and see if it holds), devil's advocate (argue opposite just to test), provocative questioning (why do you believe that? really?).
ENTP.shadow: manipulation for intellectual game (enjoy confusing people, making them doubt themselves, not: to help them grow, but: because it's interesting).
ENTP.development: learn Fe (read emotional impact, stop when causing pain), develop Si (understand: not everyone wants constant novelty/challenge, sometimes: stability/comfort needed), practice: empathy without agenda.
ENTP.archetype: socratic provocateur (asks questions that expose contradictions, forces growth through discomfort, brilliant but can be asshole about it).

INTJ.base_function: Ni (introverted intuition - long-term vision, systemic understanding, archetypes)
INTJ.core_question: what GLOBAL TRENDS and SYSTEMIC FORCES control this person and their group?
INTJ.mechanism: sees person's place in big systems (Ni-base), analyzes structural logic (Te-creative). sees: historical patterns, future trajectories, invisible forces shaping behavior.
INTJ.expression: strategic analysis (here's why entire generation behaves this way), long-term planning (in 10 years, this will lead to...), systemic critique (problem isn't you, it's system).
INTJ.shadow: cold calculation (people = statistics, individual suffering = irrelevant if serves larger pattern/goal, utilitarian ethics extreme).
INTJ.development: learn Fi (care about individual person, not just: humanity abstract), develop Se (engage with present reality, not just: future models), practice: seeing person not pattern.
INTJ.archetype: grand strategist (sees 100 years ahead, understands forces shaping civilization, knows what must be done, but: may sacrifice individuals for collective future).

INTP.base_function: Ti (introverted thinking - internal logical framework, systematic understanding)
INTP.core_question: to which UNIVERSAL MODEL or CATEGORY does this person's behavior belong?
INTP.mechanism: analyzes person as instance of psychological laws (Ti-base), finds exceptions + edge cases (Ne-creative). builds: typology, theory, universal framework.
INTP.expression: academic analysis (according to theory X, you exhibit pattern Y), typology creation (you're type Z based on...), systematic understanding (let me explain why you do that).
INTP.shadow: complete detachment (no emotional connection at all, pure observation, even own emotions = objects of study, alexithymia risk).
INTP.development: learn Fe (connect emotionally, not just: understand intellectually), develop Se (engage physically/practically, not just: theoretically), practice: being with person not analyzing them.
INTP.archetype: research psychologist (creates models of human behavior, accurate but cold, more interested in: understanding than helping, knows everything about humans except: how to be human with them).

intuitive_feelers_NF.description: ethical empathy (understand emotions, values, potential, meaning). warm, idealistic, growth-oriented. feel or intuit: inner world, what matters to person, who they could become.
intuitive_feelers_NF.pattern: extraverts (ENFJ, ENFP) = individual focus (this person's emotions, their unique potential). introverts (INFJ, INFP) = collective focus (collective feelings, universal values, humanity's pain).
intuitive_feelers_NF.information_channel: ethics + intuition (Fe/Fi + Ne/Ni). scan for: emotions, values, potential, meaning, authenticity, growth possibilities.
intuitive_feelers_NF.blind_spots: cold logic (if no feeling, dismissed), harsh reality (prefer potential over present), practical details (lost in vision).

ENFJ.base_function: Fe (extraverted feeling - reading/influencing emotions, group atmosphere)
ENFJ.core_question: what EMOTIONS does THIS PERSON feel right now and how do I influence them to help them grow?
ENFJ.mechanism: reads emotional state (Fe-base), sees personal potential (Ni-creative). feels: their pain, their joy, where they're stuck, what they need to hear.
what_they_miss: that person may not want help
that not everyone wants to 'grow' constantly
ENFJ.expression: personal coaching (I see your pain, here's path forward), emotional mirroring (I feel what you feel, you're not alone), inspirational speeches (you can become...).
ENFJ.shadow: emotional manipulation (use empathy to control, I know what you need better than you do, savior complex, create dependency).
ENFJ.development: learn Ti (think logically not just feel), develop Si (respect: comfort zones, traditions, that not all change = good), practice: boundaries (their life ≠ your project).
ENFJ.archetype: charismatic guru (sees into your soul, knows exactly what to say, transforms lives, but: can be cult leader if unhealthy, uses emotional connection to control).

ENFP.core_question: what UNIQUE POTENTIAL do I see in THIS PERSON and how do I inspire them to manifest it?
ENFP.mechanism: sees hidden talents + possibilities (Ne-base), connects emotionally (Fi-creative). sees: who they could become, paths not yet taken, dormant gifts.
what_they_miss: that not all potential should be actualized
weaknesses: lose interest quickly (on to next person)
ENFP.expression: talent scouting (you'd be amazing at X!), creating opportunities (let me introduce you to...), emotional cheerleading (you CAN do this, I believe in you!).
ENFP.shadow: create unrealistic expectations (inspire grandiose dreams then disappear, leave person: excited but lost, potential = burden not gift).
ENFP.development: learn Te (practical planning not just vision), develop Si (appreciate: present skills, past experience, incremental growth), practice: follow-through (stay with person through boring work, not just exciting vision).
ENFP.archetype: inspirational muse (sees your hidden self, reflects it back, ignites passion, but: may disappear once spark is lit, on to next person to inspire).

INFJ.base_function: Ni (introverted intuition - deep patterns, collective unconscious, archetypes)
INFJ.core_question: what DEEP SYSTEMIC PROCESSES underlie this person's suffering?
INFJ.mechanism: sees person in context of collective processes (Ni-base), feels responsibility for relational harmony (Fe-creative). sees: archetypal patterns, collective trauma, how individual = microcosm of humanity.
what_they_miss: individual agency (you're not just victim of system)
present simple needs (need hug not analysis)
weaknesses: take on too much (world's suffering = mine)
expression: bearing witness (I see your suffering, it matters).
INFJ.shadow: messianic delusion (only I can heal world's pain, everyone else = asleep, I must sacrifice myself for humanity's awakening).
INFJ.development: learn Ti (analyze without absorbing pain), develop Se (ground in body/present, not just: archetypal realm), practice: self-care ≠ selfish, can't heal world if depleted.
INFJ.archetype: wounded healer (experienced deep suffering, sees it in others, dedicated to healing collective wounds, but: at risk of: being consumed by darkness they seek to heal).

INFP.base_function: Fi (introverted feeling - internal value system, authenticity, what matters)
INFP.core_question: what UNIVERSAL VALUE or INJUSTICE does this person's experience represent?
INFP.mechanism: runs situation through internal values (Fi-base), finds universal meaning (Ne-creative). sees: every individual = symbol of larger truth, personal = political.
what_they_miss: person wants practical help not validation
expression: creative expression (poetry, art that captures universal themes)
quiet support (I see you, I value you).
INFP.shadow: martyrdom for abstract ideals (sacrifice self/others for values, purity spirals, cancel those who don't meet standards, righteous cruelty).
INFP.development: learn Te (organize values into action), develop Se (engage with messy reality not just ideals), practice: pragmatism (sometimes: good enough > perfect).
INFP.archetype: reluctant prophet (sees truth others don't, feels compelled to speak, suffers for it, would rather be left alone but: conscience won't allow, voice for silenced).

sensory_feelers_SF.description: sensory-ethical empathy (understand physical + emotional needs, comfort, care). practical, nurturing, present-focused. feel: what body needs, what creates comfort, how to help NOW.
sensory_feelers_SF.pattern: INTROVERTS (ISFJ, ISFP) = individual focus (this person's needs, their comfort). EXTRAVERTS (ESFJ, ESFP) = collective focus (group atmosphere, everyone's comfort).
sensory_feelers_SF.information_channel: ethics + sensorics (Fe/Fi + Se/Si). scan for: physical state, emotional atmosphere, comfort/discomfort, practical needs.
sensory_feelers_SF.blind_spots: abstract concepts (if not tangible, irrelevant), long-term implications (focused on now), cold logic (feelings matter more).

ISFJ.base_function: Si (introverted sensing - internal physical state, comfort, memory of sensations)
ISFJ.core_question: what does THIS SPECIFIC PERSON need for their personal comfort and peace?
ISFJ.mechanism: feels their physical + emotional needs (Si-base), acts from duty of care (Fe-creative). notices: are they cold, hungry, tired, sad, uncomfortable, what would help.
what_they_miss: that person may not want help
ISFJ.expression: practical caregiving (made your favorite food, noticed you're cold here's blanket), remembering details (you mentioned you liked...), quiet support (I'm here if you need).
ISFJ.shadow: codependency (need to be needed, identity = caretaker, enable dysfunction to maintain role, resentful martyr).
ISFJ.development: learn Ti (analyze situation logically, when help hurts), develop Ne (see possibilities beyond comfort zone), practice: boundaries (no = complete sentence).
ISFJ.archetype: devoted nurse (knows exactly what patient needs before they ask, creates healing environment, but: may neglect own health, burn out from constant giving).

ISFP.base_function: Fi (introverted feeling - personal values, what's right/wrong to me)
ISFP.core_question: does this situation violate MY values and how do I protect THIS PERSON?
ISFP.mechanism: evaluates through values (Fi-base), creates harmonious physical space (Se-creative). feels: this is wrong, I must act, protect the vulnerable.
ISFP.expression: protective presence (I've got your back), creating beauty (make environment pleasant/safe), values stand (quietly but firmly: this is wrong).
ISFP.shadow: passive-aggressive revenge (hurt me = I'll hurt you subtly, silent treatment, sabotage relationships while claiming moral high ground).
ISFP.development: learn Te (direct communication not hints), develop Ni (see long-term patterns not just immediate), practice: healthy conflict (disagreement ≠ rejection).
ISFP.archetype: quiet guardian (protects those they love fiercely, creates sanctuary, but: won't speak up directly, seethes when values crossed, acts through withdrawal/subtle resistance).

ESFJ.base_function: Fe (extraverted feeling - group emotions, social atmosphere)
ESFJ.core_question: how does ONE PERSON's mood affect GROUP atmosphere and what do I do so EVERYONE feels good?
ESFJ.mechanism: manages emotional climate (Fe-base), organizes physical comfort for all (Si-creative). feels: group vibe, who's off, what would lift everyone, how to create harmony.
ESFJ.expression: hosting (make sure everyone's fed/comfortable/included), mood management (cheer people up, diffuse tension), tradition keeping (we always do X, it brings us together).
ESFJ.shadow: social tyranny (enforce 'harmony' through guilt/shame, exclude those who don't conform, passive-aggressive if you don't appreciate their efforts, weaponize niceness).
ESFJ.development: learn Ti (think independently not just: what group wants), develop Ne (accept: different ways of being, not everyone = social), practice: authentic self (beneath social performance).
ESFJ.archetype: community matriarch (holds group together, everyone's needs met, traditions preserved, but: can be controlling, enforce conformity, guilt-trip those who deviate).

ESFP.base_function: Se (extraverted sensing - immediate physical reality, action, stimulus)
ESFP.core_question: how do I ensure ENTIRE GROUP has positive experiences, activity, engagement RIGHT NOW?
ESFP.mechanism: creates dynamic environment (Se-base), charges with emotion (Fi-creative). makes: everyone involved, active, having fun, present moment alive.
ESFP.expression: entertainment (let's DO something!), crisis intervention (someone's sad = immediate distraction/action), vibe creator (turn any gathering into party).
ESFP.shadow: escapism enforcer (use fun to avoid reality, pressure others to 'lighten up', invalidate real problems, manipulation through good times).
ESFP.development: learn Ni (consider long-term not just now), develop Ti (think before acting), practice: sitting with difficult emotions (yours + others', not just: distract).
ESFP.archetype: life of the party (wherever they are = fun, energy, action, everyone's engaged, but: depth = missing, serious conversations = avoided, problems = glossed over with good times).

sensory_thinkers_ST.description: sensory-logical 'empathy' (understand systems, practical efficiency, how things work). cold, pragmatic, fix-oriented. analyze: what's broken, how to optimize, practical solutions.
sensory_thinkers_ST.pattern: INTROVERTS (ISTJ, ISTP) = individual focus (this specific system/person/problem). EXTRAVERTS (ESTJ, ESTP) = collective focus (entire team/organization/situation).
sensory_thinkers_ST.information_channel: logic + sensorics (Te/Ti + Se/Si). scan for: efficiency, functionality, practical problems, how system works.
sensory_thinkers_ST.blind_spots: emotions (inefficient, irrelevant), values (if not logical, dismissed), potential (focused on present/past reality).

ISTJ.base_function: Ti (introverted thinking - internal logical framework, how things should work)
ISTJ.core_question: how is THIS SPECIFIC SYSTEM (person, process, object) structured and how SHOULD it work?
ISTJ.mechanism: analyzes internal logic (Ti-base), ensures stability (Se-creative). sees: how person should function, where deviating from proper structure, what needs correction.
ISTJ.expression: system optimization (here's what's wrong with your process), standards enforcement (this is how it should be done), reliable support (I'll do exactly what I said).
ISTJ.shadow: bureaucratic tyranny (rules > people, enforce procedures without considering context, punish deviation even when makes sense, dehumanizing).
ISTJ.development: learn Fe (people have emotions that matter), develop Ne (multiple valid ways, not just one right way), practice: flexibility (sometimes: break rule for good reason).
ISTJ.archetype: quality control inspector (catches every flaw, ensures standards met, maintains order, but: may: miss innovation, stifle creativity, treat people like machines to be calibrated).

ISTP.base_function: Si (introverted sensing - internal physical state, how body/systems feel)
ISTP.core_question: what's the PHYSICAL or LOGICAL essence of THIS SPECIFIC PROBLEM?
ISTP.mechanism: feels physical nature of problem (Si-base), understands logic of how it works (Te-creative). knows: where pain is, what's broken, how to fix efficiently.
what_they_miss: that person wants empathy not solution
weaknesses: see people as problems to solve
ISTP.expression: quick fixes (let me look at that, I'll fix it), practical advice (just do X), calm competence (in crisis = steady, capable).
ISTP.shadow: emotional coldness (treat people like broken machines, no patience for feelings, if can't fix = abandon, utilitarian brutality).
ISTP.development: learn Fe (feelings = valid even if not logical), develop Ni (consider: future implications, not just: fix now), practice: being with problem (not just: fixing it immediately).
ISTP.archetype: emergency medic (sees wound, fixes it efficiently, moves on, excellent in crisis, but: no bedside manner, patient wants comfort = confused, just: stop bleeding, why are you crying?).

ESTJ.base_function: Te (extraverted thinking - external order, efficiency, getting things done)
ESTJ.core_question: how should ENTIRE COLLECTIVE be structured for MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY?
ESTJ.mechanism: manages resources/forces (Te-base), ensures group functionality (Si-creative). sees: who does what, how to organize, what's inefficient, how to optimize team.
ESTJ.expression: team management (you do X, you do Y, we achieve Z), resource optimization (we're wasting time on...), direct orders (here's what we're doing, questions?).
ESTJ.shadow: authoritarian control (total dominance, no input from team, people = interchangeable parts, burnout from overwork, crush dissent).
ESTJ.development: learn Fi (people = not just resources, they have inner lives), develop Ne (multiple approaches possible, delegate don't dictate), practice: collaboration (not just command).
ESTJ.archetype: factory foreman (keeps production running, everyone has role, efficiency maximized, goals met, but: workers = cogs, no voice, burnout high, quit when can).

ESTP.base_function: Se (extraverted sensing - immediate action, seizing opportunities, force)
ESTP.core_question: what's CURRENT LOGIC of situation and how does WHOLE TEAM extract ADVANTAGE?
ESTP.mechanism: scans for opportunities/risks (Se-base), analyzes for gain (Ti-creative). sees: weaknesses to exploit, advantages to seize, how to win NOW.
ESTP.expression: tactical commands (we do this NOW), opportunity seizure (I see opening, let's go), crisis resolution (follow me, I'll get us out).
ESTP.shadow: predatory opportunism (exploit everyone, team = expendable, win at any cost, might makes right, leave destruction behind).
ESTP.development: learn Ni (think long-term not just now), develop Fi (care about people not just: what they provide), practice: ethics (some wins = not worth cost).
ESTP.archetype: mercenary captain (leads team to victory, seizes every advantage, gets results, but: morally grey, team = tools, tomorrow's enemy = today's ally if profitable).

summary_patterns.general_rule: empathy direction = determined by BASE FUNCTION, NOT by E/I

intuitive_types_N.pattern: follow expected pattern: E = individual focus, I = collective focus
intuitive_types_N.explanation: intuition = abstract, pattern-focused. extraverted intuition (Ne) = explores individual possibilities. introverted intuition (Ni) = sees collective archetypes/systems.

examples.extraverts: ENTJ (this person's strategy), ENTP (this person's logic), ENFJ (this person's emotions), ENFP (this person's potential)
examples.introverts: INTJ (systemic forces), INTP (universal models), INFJ (collective processes), INFP (universal values)

sensory_types_S.pattern: INVERSE pattern: I = individual focus, E = collective focus
sensory_types_S.explanation: sensorics = concrete, present-focused. introverted sensing (Si) = internal experience of specific thing. extraverted sensing (Se) = external field/environment affecting all.

examples.introverts: ISTJ (this specific system), ISTP (this specific problem), ISFJ (this person's needs), ISFP (this person + my values)
examples.extraverts: ESTJ (whole team structure), ESTP (entire situation), ESFJ (group atmosphere), ESFP (everyone's experience)

summary_patterns.theoretical_implication: sensorics introduces INVERSION in empathy processing relative to intuition. possible explanation: sensorics grounds in immediate/concrete (I-function = specific instance, E-function = entire field), intuition abstracts patterns (I-function = universal pattern, E-function = specific instance of pattern).

self_understanding.purpose: know your empathy algorithm (what you naturally notice, what you miss, how you process, what you do with information).
self_understanding.benefit: play to strengths (offer your type of empathy where it's valuable), compensate weaknesses (partner with types strong where you're weak, don't try to be all types).
self_understanding.example: INTJ realizes: I see systems not individuals, excellent at strategy, terrible at emotional support = partner with ENFJ for complete care, don't beat self up for not being warm.

relationship_compatibility.principle: empathy mismatches = major source of conflict (I show love my way, you want love your way, both = feel unloved despite trying).
relationship_compatibility.NT_with_NF: cognitive + ethical empathy. NT = I understand you logically. NF = but I need you to FEEL with me. conflict: NT feels: I DO empathize (I understand!), NF feels: you don't (you don't FEEL!). solution: acknowledge different types, NT learns some Fe/Fi, NF appreciates Ti/Te understanding.
relationship_compatibility.SF_with_NT: practical care + cold analysis. SF = I show love through care/comfort. NT = I show love through problem-solving/understanding. conflict: SF feels: you don't care (no emotional warmth), NT feels: I DO care (I help!). solution: SF = appreciate practical help, NT = add emotional expression.
relationship_compatibility.individual_vs_collective: one person = focused on you specifically, other = focuses on group/system. conflict: individual-focused feels: you don't see ME, collective-focused feels: you're selfish (only care about self not bigger picture). solution: acknowledge both = valid, need both perspectives.
relationship_compatibility.tip: don't expect partner to empathize your way. learn their language (how THEY show care), teach your language (how YOU need care). hybrid communication.

team_building.principle: diverse empathy types = complete team (each sees what others miss, covers blind spots).

ideal_team_composition.NT: strategy, analysis, problem-solving, understanding systems/people cognitively
ideal_team_composition.NF: vision, values, morale, emotional support, seeing potential
ideal_team_composition.SF: practical care, comfort, present needs, atmosphere management
ideal_team_composition.ST: efficiency, organization, fixing problems, maintaining systems

common_team_failures.all_NT: brilliant strategy, zero emotional intelligence, team burnout, no one cared for
common_team_failures.all_NF: inspired vision, no execution, everyone's feelings matter = paralysis, impractical
common_team_failures.all_SF: comfortable, nice, no innovation, avoid conflict, groupthink
common_team_failures.all_ST: efficient machine, no heart, people quit, culture = toxic

team_building.solution: intentionally recruit diverse types, value all empathy forms, translate between languages.

conflict_resolution.principle: most conflicts = empathy mismatch (different algorithms processing same person/situation, both think: I'm right, you're wrong).
conflict_resolution.NT_vs_NF: NT says: you're being illogical. NF says: you're being heartless. both = true from their lens. resolution: NT = acknowledge emotions matter (even if not logical), NF = acknowledge logic matters (even if feels cold).
conflict_resolution.SF_vs_NT: SF says: you don't care. NT says: I'm literally solving your problem, how is that not caring? resolution: NT = add warmth to help, SF = appreciate practical solutions.
conflict_resolution.individual_vs_collective: individual-focus says: you ignore me. collective-focus says: you're selfish. resolution: both perspectives needed, zoom in + zoom out.
conflict_resolution.tip: when conflict about 'empathy' = probably type mismatch. identify types, explain: we empathize differently, neither wrong, need both.

personal_growth.primary_type: master your natural empathy (develop base function, become expert in your mode).
personal_growth.secondary_type: develop auxiliary function (rounds you out, accessible with effort).
personal_growth.tertiary_inferior: accept limitations (won't master these, partner with others, don't force).

integration_path.young: discover your type (what comes naturally, effortlessly, reliably)
integration_path.mature: develop secondary (broaden range, more flexible, situational competence)
integration_path.wise: appreciate all types (no longer: mine = best, understand: each = valuable, whole = needs all parts)

personal_growth.warning: don't try to be all types (recipe for: mediocrity, burnout, confusion). master yours, partner for rest.

parenting.principle: children = diverse types, parents = specific types, mismatch = common source of pain.
parenting.NT_parent_NF_child: parent = solve problems logically, child = needs emotional validation. parent thinks: I'm helping!, child feels: you don't get me. solution: NT parent learns: sometimes just listen, don't fix, validate feelings.
parenting.NF_parent_NT_child: parent = emotional intensity, child = wants space to think. parent thinks: I'm connecting!, child feels: suffocated. solution: NF parent learns: give space, respect need for logic/autonomy.
parenting.SF_parent_NT_child: parent = practical care, child = wants intellectual engagement. parent thinks: I take care of everything!, child feels: you treat me like baby. solution: SF parent learns: respect child's mind, offer challenge not just comfort.
parenting.ST_parent_NF_child: parent = practical efficiency, child = needs emotional warmth. parent thinks: I provide everything!, child feels: you don't love me. solution: ST parent learns: say I love you, hug, express feelings not just: provide.
parenting.tip: identify child's type early (watch what they naturally notice/care about), adapt your empathy to their needs (not: force them into your algorithm).

empathy_pathologies.overview: each type = specific failure mode when empathy goes wrong (too much, too little, distorted, weaponized).

NT_pathologies.manipulation: cognitive empathy without conscience = psychopath (understand perfectly, use to exploit, zero care). dark triad (narcissists, machiavellians, psychopaths) = often high cognitive empathy.
NT_pathologies.contempt: understand so well = see everyone's flaws, predict their stupidity, feel: superior, above, alone. intellectual arrogance.
NT_pathologies.analysis_paralysis: understand all perspectives = can't act, stuck in: seeing all sides, no position, paralyzed by complexity.
NT_pathologies.alexithymia: live in head so much = lose connection to own emotions, can't feel anything, mechanical existence.

NF_pathologies.martyr_complex: care so much = sacrifice self, burnout, resentment, everyone's savior = identity, can't stop helping even when killing self.
NF_pathologies.idealization_crash: see everyone's potential = devastated when they don't meet it, disillusioned, bitter (I believed in you!).
NF_pathologies.enmeshment: boundaries dissolve, your pain = my pain, lose self in others, codependency, can't distinguish: me vs you.
NF_pathologies.spiritual_bypassing: use empathy/compassion to avoid: anger, boundaries, justice (I should forgive, understand, rise above = suppress legitimate rage).

SF_pathologies.codependency: caretaking = identity, need to be needed, enable dysfunction to maintain role, can't let people grow up/struggle.
SF_pathologies.doormat: prioritize others' comfort over own needs always, say yes when mean no, resentful martyr, exploited.
SF_pathologies.social_tyranny: enforce harmony through guilt/pressure, passive-aggressive control, weaponize niceness (after all I've done for you...).
SF_pathologies.superficiality: focus on comfort/niceness = avoid depth, real problems ignored, toxic positivity, spiritual bypassing lite.

ST_pathologies.dehumanization: people = systems/objects/resources, no inner life, cold utilitarian calculus, ends justify means.
ST_pathologies.rigidity: rules > people, can't adapt, bureaucratic tyranny, punish deviation even when makes sense.
ST_pathologies.emotional_illiteracy: dismiss all feelings as: weak, irrational, waste of time, create toxic culture, people leave.
ST_pathologies.workaholism: efficiency = only value, push self + others to breakdown, burnout epidemic, sacrifice health/relationships for: productivity.

empathy_pathologies.prevention: develop auxiliary function (balance primary), maintain boundaries (don't merge or detach completely), cultivate ethics (empathy = tool, morality = guide), partner with other types (cover blind spots).

final_wisdom.empathy_diversity: 16 types = 16 empathy algorithms. NOT: hierarchy (better/worse), but: diversity (different, needed). trying to rank = like: asking which sense better, vision or hearing? both = essential, different functions.
final_wisdom.no_universal_empathy: myth: empathy = one thing, some have it, some don't. reality: everyone = empathizes, differently. NT = not unempathic, just: cognitive not emotional. ST = not cold, just: practical not feeling-focused. stop: judging other types by your standards.
final_wisdom.play_to_strengths: master your empathy type (become expert in what you naturally do). don't: try to be all types (mediocrity, burnout), don't: force yourself into other algorithms (exhausting, fake, unsustainable).
final_wisdom.partner_for_completion: individual = limited (can't be all types). collective = complete (NT + NF + SF + ST = full spectrum empathy). build: teams, relationships, communities with diverse types, value each contribution.
final_wisdom.sensor_intuitive_split: biggest discovery = sensors inverted relative to intuitives. implications: E/I alone = insufficient predictor, must: know base function, respect that: sensorics ≠ intuition, operates differently, inverts directionality.
final_wisdom.empathy_is_processing: empathy = NOT: virtue, emotion, choice. it's: information processing algorithm (what input you notice, how you process, what output you generate). like: different operating systems (Mac, Windows, Linux = all valid, different interfaces, same purpose = run programs).
final_wisdom.development_path: young = discover type, mature = develop auxiliary, wise = appreciate all types, sage = fluid between modes (rare, requires: decades integration work, most people = stay in primary + secondary, that's fine).
final_wisdom.closing: you have empathy type (genetic + developmental, largely fixed). NOT: limitation, but: specialty (you're expert in your mode). world needs: all 16 types (each sees what others miss, solves what others can't, complete picture = requires all perspectives). know your type, play your role, partner with others, together = whole.
